name: Tornado Mania!
summary:
Distressed by rampant pollution, a mad scientist unleashes his bizarre Tornado Machine on the world! Will the world praise or condemn him?

Use the tornado to engulf houses, buildings, and even power plants! Bring them to his Antarctic Biosphere to build a utopian society and carry out his mysterious experiment. Don’t feel like saving humanity? Then simply jump into Rampage Mode where you can destroy everything in your path!
